name: Chocolate makes you happy: Halloween
description:
Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets, jumpers, teleports, accelerators, reverse gravity, traps, treadmills, fires, ghosts, Jack-O'-Lantern's and explosions.
The goal of the player is to keep the cookies on the chocolate bar for some time to pass the level.

In Chocolate makes you happy: Halloween:
- 50 levels
- Explosions
- Jumpers
- Teleports
- Sweets
- Accelerators
- Traps
- Changing gravity
- Treadmills
- Ghosts
- Flying Eyes
- Jack-O'-Lantern's
- Colorful art
